title: Get all IMAGE-belongs-to-node Relationships
user_story:
As an API contributor\
I want to find out whether an IMAGE is already connected to other nodes\
So I can reduce the number of orphans in the database
description:
# **Response**

**Happy path**

* positive HTTP status code (200)
* a JSON array containing the following relationship data for each item:
  * `image_id`: integer
  * `partner_node_id`: integer
  * `relationship_id`: integer
  * `relationship_name`: string

**Unhappy path**

* when there are no matches then an empty array is returned â†’ status code 200
* 404 when image does not exist

# **Acceptance Criteria**

**Behavior (Business Logic)**

* the relationships are successfully retrieved when provided with valid data
  * status code `200`
* the relationship retrieval fails when the provided data was not valid
  * `404` when `image` was not found
* when there exist no respective relationships then an empty list is returned
  * status code `200`

# **NOT in scope for this iteration**

* proper JSON structure according to the JSON:API
